title: Man dies after early hours flat fire in Perth
title_page: Man dies after early hours flat fire in Perth - BBC News
maintext:
A 62-year-old man has died after a fire took hold at a flat in Perth.
Firefighters were called to the blaze on St Catherine's Road at about 04:50 - they extinguished the flames and left at about 06:45.
Police confirmed that a man was found inside the property and was pronounced dead at the scene.
A joint investigation was carried out and it was determined there were no suspicious circumstances. A report will be submitted to the procurator fiscal.
